channel.title: CVE Feed for The QEMU Project -- Qemu-kvm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The QEMU Project -- Qemu-kvm

item.title: CVE-2018-10839|2024-08-05T07:46:47.471Z -- the%20qemu%20project -- qemu-kvm
item.description: Qemu emulator <= 3.0.0 built with the NE2000 NIC emulation support is vulnerable to an integer overflow, which could lead to buffer overflow issue. It could occur when receiving packets over the network. A user inside guest could use this flaw to crash the Qemu process resulting in DoS.
